resources.string: Can you eat a particular kind of cheese?
Give me the following information and I will tell you if it is safe for you and your baby.

In order to categorize cheeses I use a formula based on the percentage of milk fat and the percentage of moisture. Moisture is an important factor considered in the equation because a too high rate favors the development of bacteria.\n\nTo help you I need to know if the milk is pasteurized, the percentage of milk fat and the percentage of moisture. Usually you can find this information on the product label.
